textBeforeTable: Gilpin Railing Dimensions   Gilpin Summit Handrail 48" Wide 60" Wide 72" Wide 84" Wide 96" Wide Summit Aluminum Handrail provides a 2 1/2" top rail. Use the Wall Support Brackets to attach any length handrail. If longer sections are needed, the handrail can be joined with these brackets. As a rule of thumb, divide the length of your handrail by 4 and add 1 to determine the number of brackets you will need. The Decorative End Caps complete your handrail project. These caps will provide a decorative end to the handrail. Gilpin Summit Handrail Aluminum Railings Gilpin Railings Fairfield 42" 42H x 48W 42H x 60W 42H x 72W 42H x 96W- not sold separately Gilpin Railings Fairfield 36" 36H x 48W 36H x 60W 36H x 72W 36H x 96W- not sold separately Fairfield Aluminum Railing adds a third rail to the Summit Railing for added style. Manufactured from high grade aluminum
textAfterTable: Click here for Summit Style installation instructions. Specrail Railings Specrail Avon Aluminum Railings Avon aluminum railings are constructed of aluminum extrusions with stainless steel screws. Designed for easy installation, it provides the look and feel of quality. Avon railings offer a simple, yet sturdy design, adding an element of beauty to stairs, ramps, porches and decks. Whether your application is residential, commercial or industrial, the Avon series is an ideal fit!
